full_summary:
### Developing Knowledge Products for Education Professionals

**Tender Announcement**

**Contract Name:** Developing Targeted Knowledge Products for Education Professionals to Facilitate Implementation of the Blueprint for Action

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Published:** 2023-10-17

**Closing Date:** 2023-11-22T14:00:00

The Public Health Agency of Canada's Centre for Mental Health and Wellbeing requires the development and dissemination of tailored knowledge products for education professionals. These products are designed to support the uptake of the Blueprint for Action: Preventing substance-related harms among youth through a Comprehensive School Health approach.

**Purpose:**

The aim is to create a suite of role-specific resources for distinct education professional audiences, providing practical guidance on adapting and implementing the strategies outlined in the Blueprint for Action. These resources will support education professionals in adapting and implementing the strategies in line with their respective roles, responsibilities, and operating contexts.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop role-specific resources for distinct education professional audiences (e.g., teachers and administrators)
- Provide detailed guidance on adapting and implementing the strategies outlined in the Blueprint for Action
- Strategically disseminate the resources to a wide network of Canadian education professionals and school stakeholders

**Contract Details:**

- Contract period: up to 1 year
- Contract start date: 2023-12-15
- Contract end date: 2024-12-30

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### How to Respond

For further information, please visit: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22358/1000253704-qa_q2-q3.pdf>, <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22358/1000253704-qa_1.pdf>, and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22358/1000253704-request-for-proposal-en.pdf>

Prospective bidders are to submit their proposals by the closing date. Please contact Montana Myers at montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca for any questions or clarification. Note that the notices and attachments are available in both English and French.

Note that this is currently **expired**, but you may still find the information useful for future reference.
